concept.title: LET clause
concept.shortdesc: Use LET to create new names with values that can be referred to anywhere in the query.

dlentry.dd: [Required] String or expression that represents the name of the variable.
[Required] String or expression that represents the value assigned to its alias.
In the query, the alias is replaced with its corresponding value_expr value.

p.b: Example 1: Use LET to select which field to include from which bucket.
